question.title: Does KeyHolder keep order of rows in batch insert?
question.body:
I am using NamedParameterJdbcTemplate.batchUpdate to insert a batch of rows to the the database. Third parameter of the method is a KeyHolder instance that I can use to retrieve the list of generated keys via the KeyHolder.getKeyList() method.

My question is: does the order of values in the result of getKeyList() correspond to the order of rows inserted via batchUpdate()?

(For example, if I am inserting rows A, B, C in a batch, then is it guaranteed that getKeyList() returns A.id, B.id, C.id in this order? Therefore, can I just zip the two lists together to know which inserted entry received which generated key?)
